entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 9:00 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.7°C

Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.3°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
